subjects.name: Django Web Development
subjects.description: A complete guide to mastering web development using the Django framework.

topics.name: Introduction to Django
topics.description: Overview of Django, its features, and the MVC architecture.

topics.name: Setting Up the Django Environment
topics.description: Installing Django, setting up a virtual environment, and creating a project.

topics.name: Django Project Structure
topics.description: Understanding Django's project structure, apps, and their components.

topics.name: Django Models and ORM
topics.description: Creating models, using Django ORM for database operations, and migrations.

topics.name: Django Views and Templates
topics.description: Function-based views (FBV), class-based views (CBV), and using templates for dynamic content.

topics.name: Django Forms and Validations
topics.description: Creating forms, handling form submissions, and performing validations.

topics.name: Django URL Routing
topics.description: Defining URL patterns and linking views to URLs.

topics.name: Django Admin Interface
topics.description: Customizing the Django admin panel and managing models.

topics.name: Static and Media Files in Django
topics.description: Serving static and media files in a Django project.

topics.name: User Authentication in Django
topics.description: Implementing user authentication, login, logout, and registration.

topics.name: Django Middleware
topics.description: Understanding middleware and creating custom middleware.

topics.name: Advanced Django ORM Techniques
topics.description: Query optimization, aggregation, and using raw SQL queries.

topics.name: Django Security Best Practices
topics.description: Implementing security measures like CSRF, XSS, and SQL injection prevention.

topics.name: File Uploads and Management
topics.description: Handling file uploads and management in Django.

topics.name: Django REST Framework (DRF)
topics.description: Building RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework.

topics.name: Testing in Django
topics.description: Writing unit tests, integration tests, and using Django's testing tools.

topics.name: Internationalization and Localization
topics.description: Translating a Django app to multiple languages.

topics.name: Django Signals
topics.description: Using signals for decoupled event handling in Django.

topics.name: Caching in Django
topics.description: Implementing caching strategies to optimize performance.

topics.name: Integrating Frontend Frameworks
topics.description: Combining Django with frontend frameworks like React or Vue.js.

topics.name: GraphQL with Django
topics.description: Building GraphQL APIs with Django and Graphene.

topics.name: Real-time Features with Django Channels
topics.description: Adding real-time capabilities with WebSockets using Django Channels.

topics.name: Django Deployment
topics.description: Deploying Django applications using Gunicorn, Nginx, and Docker.

topics.name: Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
topics.description: Automating deployment with tools like Jenkins, Travis CI, and GitHub Actions.

topics.name: Django Asynchronous Views
topics.description: Implementing asynchronous views and optimizing performance.

topics.name: Scaling Django Applications
topics.description: Scaling applications horizontally and vertically.

topics.name: Custom Django Commands
topics.description: Creating custom management commands for Django applications.

topics.name: WebSockets in Django
topics.description: Implementing WebSockets for real-time data communication.

topics.name: Dockerizing Django Projects
topics.description: Containerizing Django applications with Docker.

topics.name: Advanced Django Settings Management
topics.description: Managing settings for different environments and secrets management.

topics.name: Building a SaaS Application with Django
topics.description: Designing and developing a SaaS platform using Django.

topics.name: Practical Django Projects
topics.description: Building real-world applications like eCommerce, blogs, and social networks.
